relevant_findings.general: Alert and oriented x3, no acute distress
relevant_findings.HEENT: No scleral icterus, mucous membranes moist
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no respiratory distress
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, nondistended, focal right lower quadrant tenderness to palpation with voluntary guarding, no rebound, no palpable masses or hernias
relevant_findings.DRE: Normal tone, no gross or occult blood
relevant_findings.extremities: No edema, warm and well perfused
